entry.title: Strategy Alexandra
entry.content:
This strategy is generally known as "The Harvest", complete details about "Harvest" can be found in an ebook located on my HDD. We are going to call the strategy Alexandra not harvest. The Alexandra strategy is only interesting for me because it will enable me to be part of a trading group setup by the author of the strategy. This group will trade the London open from 0800-1100 UTC each day. On looking at this strategy it looks kinda dodgy, so I'm keen to see how it goes in live trading.

I have not backtested Alexandra at this point. You can ignore the following text in brackets [has been backtested on the following instruments [AUDUSD, EURUSD ...] and in the following timeframes [M5, M15, H1 ...]. Backtest documentation and results are located [here]].

The strategy uses indicators [][], [][] & [][].

Entry:Long

use pseudo code Initiate LONG position when the RSI (7) touches the 25 level from below, wait for the first Blue MACD dot to form and then go LONG.

Stop

use pseudo code. employ the use of Trailing Stops or place your stop loss below the MACD dots.

Exit

use pseudo code. you can exit your open position when a red MACD DOT forms above the candlestick or you can wait for the RSI to touch the 75 level from below.

piccy: Error processing input, expected syntax: {% img [class name(s)] [http[s]:/]/path/to/image [width [height]] [title text | "title text" ["alt text"]] %}

Entry:Short

use pseudo code: initiate a SHORT position when the RSI (7) touches the 75 level from above, wait for the first Red MACD dot to appear,then sell.

Stop

use pseudo code: Apply Trailing Stops into your trading strategy or place your stop loss above the red MACD dots.

Exit

use pseudo code: You can exit your open position when you see the formation of the first blue MACD DOT form below the candlestick or you can wait for the RSI to touch the 25 level upward.
